data.title: Best Movies Like Seabiscuit
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Seabiscuit: Secretariat (2010), Cinderella Man (2005), Without Limits (1998), The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000), The Blind Side (2009), Ride Like a Girl (2019), Moneyball (2011), Invincible (2006), The Game of Their Lives (2005), Miracle (2004)
